attributes.action: Ban from making petitions those who make petitions to ban motorcycling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People making petitions attempting ot ban motorcycling are making the roads a much more dangerous place. Their lack of understanding of the science of motorcycling makes them less safe on the roads than their duo-cyclic cousins, and much more likely to cause accidents. Their low intellect and poor motor skills also make them prone to distraction and subsequent tragedy.

rejection.details: Please email your concerns to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
